common.title: Amplify Documentation
common.description: AWS Amplify is everything you need to build web and mobile apps. Easy to start, easy to scale.

home.title: Amplify Documentation
home.description: AWS Amplify is everything you need to build web and mobile apps. Easy to start, easy to scale.
home.fullDescription: You can build a fullstack app using Amplify backend building capabilities and deploy your web app using Amplify Hosting.
home.buildFullstack: Build fullstack apps with your framework of choice
home.frameworkDescription: You can use AWS Amplify with popular web and mobile frameworks like JavaScript, Flutter, Swift, and React. Build, connect, and host fullstack apps on AWS. Get started by selecting your preferred framework.
home.codeFirstDescription: The fullstack TypeScript developer experience lets you focus on your app code instead of infrastructure.
